item.title:
Account Abstraction AMA?
My beef with 4337: The alt mempool, paymaster/bundler separation, super general userop validation impose meaningful overheads or limitations (eg paymaster storage slot stuff) to users and devs.
4337 isn't that widely adopted yet so IMO room for competing approach.
